dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S2378 IS: Waterway LNG Parity Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cassidy (for himself and Mr. Bennet) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an energy equivalent of a gallon of diesel in the case of liquefied natural gas for purposes of the Inland Waterways Trust Fund financing rate.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Waterway LNG Parity Act of 2015.

section.header: Liquefied natural gas equivalent for purposes of Inland Waterways Trust Fund financing rate

subsection.text: Section 4042(b)(2)(A) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: The Inland Waterways Trust Fund financing rate is 29 cents per gallon (per energy equivalent of a gallon of diesel, in the case of liquefied natural gas).

subsection.header: Energy equivalent of a gallon of diesel
subsection.text: Section 4042(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Energy equivalent of a gallon of diesel with respect to liquefied natural gas
paragraph.text: For purposes of paragraph (2)(A), the term energy equivalent of a gallon of diesel means 6.06 pounds of liquefied natural gas.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to any sale or use of fuel after December 31, 2015.
